jaicore.ml.cache

Class Instruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • jaicore.ml.cache.Instruction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoadDataSetInstruction, SplitInstruction

    public abstract class Instruction
extends java.lang.Object
    Instruction class that can be converted into json. Used by ReproducibleInstances. The instructions are used to store information about the dataset origin and the splits done. Supported are LoadDataSetInstruction and SplitInstruction at the moment.
    An instruction is identified by a command name, that specifies the type of instruction and a list if input parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • getCommand

        public java.lang.String getCommand()
        Sets command name that specifies the type of instruction represented by the object. Every instructions has a unique command name.
        Returns:
        the name of the command used to identify it.

      • setCommand

        public void setCommand(java.lang.String command)
        Gets command name that specifies the type of instruction represented by the object. Every instructions needs a unique command name.
        Parameters:
        command - name of the command

      • getInputs

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getInputs()
        Inputs are parameters of the instruction. These inputs are used to reproduce the effects of this instruction.
        Returns:
        the list of input arguments for the instruction

      • setInputs

        public void setInputs(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> inputs)
        Sets the input parameters that will be used to reproduce the effects done by this instruction.
        Parameters:
        inputs - map of inputs as pairs of to Strings.
